original_title: Everything You Wanted to Know About Sudden Birth (but were afraid to ask)
overview: The amazing story of how the Berkeley police department, the Nazi invasion of the Netherlands, an Academy Award winner and Mr. Spock from TV’s Star Trek are all connected by “Sudden Birth”, one of the most unintentionally hilarious and disturbing educational films ever created.
title: Everything You Wanted to Know About Sudden Birth (but were afraid to ask)
